documentation.text:
@dev Get total number of credentials issued
 @return Total credential count

devdoc.details: Interface for the Credential NFT contract Defines all operations related to credential issuance, transfer, and management

returns._0: True if credential exists, false otherwise

getHolderCredentials(address).details: Get all credentials owned by a holder

returns._0: Array of token IDs owned by the holder

getIssuer(uint256).details: Get issuer address for a credential

getIssuerCredentials(address).details: Get all credentials issued by an issuer

returns._0: Array of token IDs issued by the issuer

getTotalCredentials().details: Get total number of credentials issued

isExpired(uint256).details: Check if a credential is expired

isRevoked(uint256).details: Check if a credential is revoked

returns._0: True if transferable, false if soulbound

issueCredential(address,uint8,string,uin.details: Issue a new credential NFT to a holder

params.credentialHash: Hash of credential data for integrity
params.expirationDate: Timestamp when credential expires (0 for non-expiring)
params.isRevocable: Whether this credential can be revoked
params.metadataURI: IPFS CID or URI containing credential metadata

returns.tokenId: The ID of the newly minted credential NFT

renewCredential(uint256,uint256).details: Renew an expirable credential with new expiration date

params.tokenId: The ID of the credential to renew

revokeCredential(uint256,string).details: Revoke a credential (only by original issuer)

params.tokenId: The ID of the credential to revoke

devdoc.title: ICredential
